config.fertilizer_mode.title: Fertilizer Mode
config.fertilizer_mode.tooltip.multi-fer: multi-fertilizer-stack: Allows you to mix different types of fertilizers with varied levels on a single crop space.
multi-fertilizer-single-level: Allows you to mix different types of fertilizers but only at a single level on a crop space.
config.fertilizer_mode.tooltip.single-fe: single-fertilizer-replace: Allows you to replace a single type of fertilizer at any time on a crop space.
single-fertilizer-stack: Allows you to stack a single type of fertilizer with different levels on a crop space.
config.fertilizer_mode.tooltip.vanilla: Vanilla: Default Stardew Valley fertilizer behavior.
config.fertilizer_mode.tooltip.note:
Note: This config only applies when you use fertilizer.
      If you've already mixed fertilizer on a tile and then disable this option, 
      those tiles will still work as per the previous setting.
config.enable_fertilizer_anytime.title: Enable Fertilizer Anytime
config.enable_fertilizer_anytime.tooltip: Allows you to apply fertilizer to a crop space that already has crops on it.
config.keep_fertilizer_across_season.too: Allow fertilizers to not disappear between seasons.
config.affect_multi_harvest.title: Affect Multi-Harvest
config.affect_multi_harvest.tooltip: Whether speed fertilizers remain active after the first harvest for multi harvest crops (e.g. ancient fruit).
config.speed_gro_bonus.title: Speed-Gro Bonus
config.speed_gro_bonus.tooltip: Modify the speed bonus from Speed-Gro; default 10% (0.1)
config.deluxe_speed_gro_bonus.title: Deluxe Speed-Gro Bonus
config.deluxe_speed_gro_bonus.tooltip: Modify the speed bonus from Deluxe Speed-Gro; default 25% (0.25)
config.hyper_speed_gro_bonus.title: Hyper Speed-Gro Bonus
config.hyper_speed_gro_bonus.tooltip: Modify the speed bonus from Hyper Speed-Gro; default 33% (0.33)
config.speed_gro_amount.title: Speed-Gro Amount
config.speed_gro_amount.tooltip: Modify the amount of Speed-Gro you get per craft; default 5
config.deluxe_speed_gro_amount.title: Deluxe Speed-Gro Amount
config.deluxe_speed_gro_amount.tooltip: Modify the amount of Deluxe Speed-Gro you get per craft; default 5
config.hyper_speed_gro_amount.title: Hyper Speed-Gro Amount
config.hyper_speed_gro_amount.tooltip: Modify the amount of Hyper Speed-Gro you get per craft; default 1
config.basic_fertilizer_bonus.title: Basic Fertilizer Bonus
config.basic_fertilizer_bonus.tooltip: Modify the quality bonus from Basic Fertilizer; default 1
config.quality_fertilizer_bonus.title: Quality Fertilizer Bonus
config.quality_fertilizer_bonus.tooltip: Modify the quality bonus from Quality Fertilizer; default 2
config.deluxe_fertilizer_bonus.title: Deluxe Fertilizer Bonus
config.deluxe_fertilizer_bonus.tooltip: Modify the quality bonus from Deluxe Fertilizer; default 3
config.basic_fertilizer_amount.title: Basic Fertilizer Amount
config.basic_fertilizer_amount.tooltip: Modify the amount of Basic Fertilizer get per craft; default 1
config.quality_fertilizer_amount.title: Quality Fertilizer Amount
config.quality_fertilizer_amount.tooltip: Modify the amount of Quality Fertilizer you get per craft; default 2
config.deluxe_fertilizer_amount.title: Deluxe Fertilizer Amount
config.deluxe_fertilizer_amount.tooltip: Modify the amount of Deluxe Fertilizer you get per craft; default 5
config.basic_retaining_soil_bonus.title: Basic Retaining Soil Bonus
config.basic_retaining_soil_bonus.toolti: Modify the chance of retaining water when using Basic Retaining Soil; default 33% (0.33)
config.quality_retaining_soil_bonus.tool: Modify the chance of retaining water when using Quality Retaining Soil; default 66% (0.66)
config.deluxe_retaining_soil_bonus.title: Deluxe Retaining Soil Bonus
config.deluxe_retaining_soil_bonus.toolt: Modify the chance of retaining water when using Deluxe Retaining Soil; default 100% (1.0)
config.basic_retaining_soil_amount.title: Basic Retaining Soil Amount
config.basic_retaining_soil_amount.toolt: Modify the amount of Basic Retaining Soil you get per craft; default 1
config.quality_retaining_soil_amount.too: Modify the amount of Quality Retaining Soil you get per craft; default 2
config.deluxe_retaining_soil_amount.tool: Modify the amount of Deluxe Retaining Soil you get per craft; default 1
